Package Game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutWindow
    Classical about windows, with the name of the project, a link to the sources, the name of the authors and licenses information.
    BaseBoard
    A basic board which can perform basic moves
    Board
    class which represent the game board, with specific rules.
    BoardIniIA
    BoardIniIA is an AI that trie to found the best beginning in the given board according to the placement rules.
    BoardInitializationBoundary
    manage the size and position of the beginning zone according to the size of the board, the number of teams and the currant team.
    BoardPoint
    keep together the abscissa and the ordinate of a point on the board.
    Cell
    A basic cell with its team number and its coordinates.
    Game
    used to launch the main window
    GraphicBoard
    The Graphic Board contains the board plus some graphic and event elements
    GraphicBoardIni
    extended from GraphicBoard, this class is an interface specially designed for the placement of the cells by an human player at the beginning of the game.
    MainWindows
    class of the main window which contains the whole game
    Move
    keep together the beginning and end points of a move and its score in order to simplify the management task on the AI.
    Options
    contains all the options needed for a new game.
    OptionWindow
    window used to set all the options for the game
    ResultBoardAndScore
    This class make it easier to have together a board and its score: useful in BoardIniIA, when the AI is trying to found the best beginning scheme.
    Team
    Management of the teams including the IA for non human player
